name: PostProduct

Content-Type.description: Type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

attributes.description: Attributes of the product. Attributes are additional properties used to create site browsing filters.
attributes.title: attributes

categoryIds.description: Product's Categories unique identifier numbers. It can have multiples IDs for each Category and Subcategories.
categoryIds.title: categoryIds

description.description: Description of the primary information related to the product. A simple and easy-to-understand summary for the customer.
description.title: description

externalId.description: Product reference unique identifier number in the store.
externalId.title: externalId

images.description: Information of the images of the product.

url.description: Image URL, which must be in the following format: `https://{accountName}.vtexassets.com/assets/{path}`, saved using the [Catalog Images app](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-developer-docs/docs/vtex-catalog-images).
url.title: url

images.title: images

name.description: Product Name. Use simple words and avoid other languages or complex writing. This field is essential for SEO and must respect the 150 character limit.
name.title: name

origin.description: Origin account of the product. It is not possible to alter products where the origin is `marketplace`.
origin.title: origin

ean.description: Unique SKU identification code (barcode), composed of up to 13 numeric characters.
ean.title: ean

externalId.description: Unique reference code created to improve the store's organization. This is not a required field.
externalId.title: externalId

isActive.description: If the SKU is active (`true`) or inactive (`false`).
isActive.title: isActive

manufacturerCode.description: SKU reference code in the store.
manufacturerCode.title: code

name.description: SKU Name. Use simple words and avoid other languages or complex writing. This field is essential for SEO and must respect the 150 character limit.
name.title: name

specs.description: SKU specifications. This field is mandatory, but nullable if there is only one SKU.
specs.title: specs

slug.description: Reference of the product in the URL of the store.
slug.title: slug

specs.description: Specifications that will differentiate the possible product SKUs.
specs.title: specs

status.description: Status of the product. Its values can be `active` or `inactive`.
status.title: status

$ul: **attributes**: Attributes of the product. Attributes are additional properties used to create site browsing filters.
**brandName**: Name of the Brand associated with the product.
**categoryIds**: Product's Categories unique identifier numbers. It can have multiples IDs for each Category and Subcategories.
**categoryNames**: Names of the product's categories, displayed in a path format.
**createdAt**: Date when the product was created.
**externalId**: Product reference unique identifier number in the store.
**images**: Information of the images of the product.
**name**: Product Name. Use simple words and avoid other languages or complex writing. This field is essential for SEO and must respect the 150 character limit.
**origin**: Origin account of the product. It is not possible to alter products where the origin is `marketplace`.
**slug**: Reference of the product in the URL of the store.
**specs**: Specifications that will differentiate the possible product SKUs.
**status**: Status of the product. Its values can be `active` or `inactive`.
**updatedAt**: Last date when the product was updated.
